title: How do I fix this?
body:
While playing a game of ranked, I experienced several lag spikes followed by dc'ing and being unable to reconnect. I've tried turning firewalls off, I ended all other gaming-related programs, cycled the modem, rebooted comp... nothing worked.

What else can I do to get back into this game or should I just wait for leaver busterino, tell it I won't leave if the game lets me play?

replies.body: pretty sure the servers are buggered at the moment, i'm in the same situation you're in, right now.
Do you have a UEFI Video card?

Guess I'll give up and play some other game then :(

Rito, pls, fix your stuff{{item:3070}}
Its nothing on your end buddy, server problems on ritos side {{item:3070}}
